Title: Relates to intermediate side reflex reflectors or intermediate side marker lamps on motorcycles
Summary: Relates to intermediate side reflex reflectors or intermediate side marker lamps on motorcycles; prohibits white, red or blue reflectors or lamps; prohibits intermediate side marker lamps from revolving, rotating, flashing, oscillating, constantly moving, or being designed to illuminate the roadway around the motorcycle or otherwise be a distraction.
LawCode: Amd ยง381, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to intermediate side reflex reflectors or intermediate side marker lamps on motorcycles
